text: Douglas Wayne Owens (May 2, 1937 â€“ December 18, 2002) was an American politician. He was a member of the United States House of Representatives for Utah's 2nd congressional district from 1973 to 1975 and again from 1987 to 1993. In the 2014 and 2016 congressional elections, Wayne Owens's son, Doug Owens, ran for election to Utah's 4th congressional district.Another Owens Jumps into Utah Politics, UtahPolicy.com, Bob Bernick, January 27, 2014. Retrieved January 8, 2019. He lost to Republican candidate Mia Love in both of his runs. Owens died from a heart attack on December 18, 2002 while on a trip in Tel Aviv, Israel at the age of 65.Wayne Owens, Ex-Congressman, Is Found Dead ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1937 births Category:2002 deaths Category:United States representatives from Utah Category:Lawyers from Salt Lake City, Utah Category:Politicians from Salt Lake City, Utah Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Wayne Owens
